title: am i gonna drop rank if not playing rank since today?
body:
i m going to another country for business and cant play anymore until the beginning of next year.
now i m just at plat 5 and zero score. i  dont want to get drop rank if not playing for about 20 days thats the end of rank of this year. pls someone knows it?

replies.body: I think 20 days is not a time where you drop, ofc after a time you will drop to Gold I , but not after 20 days, so don't panik and enjoy your trip :D

Ranked decay does become a factor once you reach Platinum rank!  Ou[r ranked play FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)has more info, but you'll have 28 days before starting to decay.  If you fall at or below zero LP as a result of decay, you'll be placed in the next-lowest division.
